title: Camera Firmware Engineer - ISP
summary: Apple is world-class for its dedication to innovation and excellence. As part of our video engineering group, you will be at the forefront of developing sophisticated imaging and video processing technologies for our camera embedded systems. We are looking for individuals who share our passion for pushing the boundaries of what's possible.
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced embedded software engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be instrumental in developing powerful camera technology, including advanced image signal processing (ISP) and machine learning algorithms, for Apple products. You will also diagnose and optimize the performance of our embedded systems and improve our camera processing pipeline architecture.

Job responsibilities:

1. Develop pioneering camera technology for Apple products, focusing on advanced ISP and machine learning techniques.
2. Implement and optimize machine learning algorithms for image and video enhancement and analysis.
3. Design and develop robust ISP pipelines for high-performance camera systems.
4. Diagnose and troubleshoot performance issues in embedded systems.
5. Optimize system performance to improve efficiency and reliability.
6. Collaborate with multi-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
key_qualifications: Proficiency in C/C++, Strong expertise in multi-threading programming within an RTOS environment, Profound knowledge and experience with ARM-based SoCs, Extensive experience in image and video signal processing, including ISP and machine learning algorithms, Consistent track record of system performance optimization, Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail, Experience with Apple development tools and environments is a plus, Prior work in camera systems or related fields is a plus
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 10 years relevant industry experience
